body.content:
Welcome to the Ultimate Treasure Hunt!

Ready to embark on an epic journey? You're about to enter a world filled with mysterious clues, hidden treasures, and exciting challenges around every corner.

What awaits you:
• Scan & Discover: Use your camera to scan QR codes and uncover secrets
• Earn Rewards: Collect points and unlock exclusive prizes
• Explore Locations: Visit real-world places to find hidden treasures
• Compete: Challenge friends and climb the leaderboard

Game Rules:
1. Stay Safe: Always be aware of your surroundings
2. Respect Property: Don't trespass or damage anything
3. Have Fun: Enjoy the adventure with friends and family

Are you ready to begin your quest?
